movie.title: Shrek 2
movie.genre: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Romance
movie.director: Andrew Adamson, Kelly Asbury, Conrad Vernon
movie.writer: William Steig (based upon the book by), Andrew Adamson (story by), Andrew Adamson (screenplay by), Joe Stillman (screenplay by), J. David Stem (screenplay by), David N. Weiss (screenplay by), Cody Cameron (additional dialogue), Walt Dohrn (additional dialogue), Chris Miller (additional dialogue), David P. Smith (additional dialogue), Conrad Vernon (additional dialogue)
movie.actors: Mike Myers, Eddie Murphy, Cameron Diaz, Julie Andrews
movie.plot: Princess Fiona's parents invite her and Shrek to dinner to celebrate her marriage. If only they knew the newlyweds were both ogres.
movie.awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 18 wins & 50 nominations.
